alert.note: Alert for Austin; Coastal Jackson; Colorado; Fort Bend; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Wharton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 16 at 3:43PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT SOUTHEASTERN COLORADO... WHARTON...SOUTHEASTERN AUSTIN...JACKSON...WEST CENTRAL FORT BEND AND NORTHWESTERN MATAGORDA COUNTIES THROUGH 415 PM CDT... At 342 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles west of Wallis to near El Campo to near Inez. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Western Rosenberg, El Campo, Wharton, Edna, Eagle Lake, East Bernard, Ganado, Wallis, Point Comfort, Beasley, Kendleton, Orchard, La Ward, Pierce, Lolita, southeastern Weston Lakes, Cordele, Egypt, Louise, and Morales. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Austin; Coastal Jackson; Colorado; Fort Bend; Inland Jackson; Inland Matagorda; Wharton
